thread.title: Russian journalist Babchenko turns up alive after reported murder

title: Russian journalist Babchenko turns up alive after reported murder
text:
Russian journalist Babchenko turns up alive after reported murder 9:02pm IST - 00:42
Russian journalist and Kremlin critic Arkady Babchenko dramatically appeared alive in the middle of a briefing about his assassination. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Russian journalist and Kremlin critic Arkady Babchenko dramatically appeared alive in the middle of a briefing about his assassination. Rough cut (no reporter narration). Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2L5tDMe
